function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variations in PPE use and efficacy testing","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection among workers","Mitigation":"Standardizing PPE use protocols and conducting regular efficacy testing","Technologies":"Advanced PPE materials and testing equipment","People":"Workers, healthcare professionals, essential personnel","Owner":"Employers, healthcare organizations, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Inconsistent implementation of surveillance measures","Impact":"Failure to detect and contain COVID-19 outbreaks in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing standardized surveillance protocols and regular testing","Technologies":"RT-PCR testing, contact tracing technology","People":"Employers, healthcare professionals, essential personnel","Owner":"Employers, healthcare organizations, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of formal quantitative synthesis for changes in work arrangements and worker education interventions","Impact":"Limited ability to assess the effectiveness of these interventions in preventing COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting formal quantitative synthesis studies to evaluate the impact of changes in work arrangements and worker education","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, intervention evaluation frameworks","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, healthcare organizations"}]}
